Text: Fire SaleREAL HUMAN SKELETONPST John Im used to calling you Johnny so please let me know your preference Anyway I just wanted to follow up on our conversation about selling my bones Im going to scan a picture of her as soon as I can and forward that to you as well I forgot to mention that the guys I bought it from were Oddfellows which is a fraternal organization kind of like the Masons except for lower class types their words If youre not familiar with the Oddfellows they made the news recently because they use skeletons in their initiation rituals Very odd indeed They guys told me the bones are femaleI dont know how to tell Talk soon Peter
